column9: No BG with high levels during the 4 years I have been on it.

column2: Paparag, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I take this with Januvia and it works better than anything I have taken before. Finally I can get readings of 97-115. I hope it continues to work this well. But for now it is the best thing since baked bread.

column2: John Day, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Glucose levels rose 60-70 points over previous medication,requesting doctor to switch me back.

column2: clmurray03, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: this medication actually cut my blood sugar levels in half, I had to cut the mg to 2mg instead of 4mg.  Works great.
